first_para: David Gordon Mundell (born 27 May 1962) is a British Conservative politician and, since 2005, he has been the only Conservative Member of Parliament representing a Scottish constituency (Dumfriesshire, Clydesdale and Tweeddale) at Westminster. Since the 2010 UK general election he has been the Parliamentary Under-Secretary of State for Scotland, based at the Scotland Office.

full.extract: David Gordon Mundell (born 27 May 1962) is a British Conservative politician and, since 2005, he has been the only Conservative Member of Parliament representing a Scottish constituency (Dumfriesshire, Clydesdale and Tweeddale) at Westminster. Since the 2010 UK general election he has been the Parliamentary Under-Secretary of State for Scotland, based at the Scotland Office.
full.title: David Mundell
